name: Mirror Prepayment
author: 紫酱动漫
content: Shen Jin Feng was eating when he was suddenly pulled into another dimension. In this world, survival depends on defeating monsters and leveling up, with everyone having a basic status panel for guidance. However, Shen Jin Feng quickly discovered that his panel was different. At first, he could only summon mirror images of enemies, but soon he realized he could even preclaim battle rewards — obtaining enemy mirror images, equipment, and experience before winning the fight.Although the number of m
